articles.title: Hubble Space Telescope takes best picture yet of the comet visiting from another solar system - AP News
articles.description: The Hubble Space Telescope has captured the best picture yet of a high-speed comet visiting our solar system from another star. NASA and the European Space Agency released the latest photos Thursday. The interstellar comet was discovered last month by a teles…
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. (AP) The Hubble Space Telescope has captured the best picture yet of a high-speed comet visiting our solar system from another star.
